img.title: Taos Academy Guide Animation
img.style: text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; border: 0px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); margin-bottom: 5px; width: 230px; height: 322px;

br.p: An introduction to the varied lives and experiences of a Taos Academy Student. Shot and produced by Taos Academy Film class. See more on our Youtube Channel.

div.p: We are a State Charter public school offering a dynamic and innovative educational delivery system. It is our privilege to provide 5th-12th grade students with engaging and rigorous core curriculum, highly motivating elective classes, leadership and career training, college preparation and community involvement through our state-of-the-art 21st century learning environment. We hope you will find everything you need here on our website, whether you are a guest, a parent, staff or student, we strive to communicate clearly through our web and social media presence and through your Taos Academy Gmail account. If you need help accessing information from any of our systems, please don't hesitate to contact us at the numbers below.
